release.identifiers: [{"type":"Barcode","value":"6 03497 85338 0","description":"Printed"},{"type":"Barcode","value":"603497853380","description":"Scanned"},{"type":"Rights Society","value":"BMI"},{"type":"Matrix / Runout","value":"RCV1-3595-A IS MASTERED BY CAPITOL 32209.1(3)\u2026","description":"Runout A"},{"type":"Matrix / Runout","value":"RCV1-3595-B IS OHIO 32209.2(3)\u2026","description":"Runout B"}]
release.notes:
LP housed in standard single sleeve with reproduction poster and custom inner sleeve featuring artwork, additional credits, and Devo Fan Club info. Limited to 3,650 copies pressed on opaque grey vinyl. Released as part of [url=https://www.discogs.com/label/33244-Rhino-Records-2]Rhino[/url]'s 2020 "Start Your Ear Off Right" reissue campaign.

Runout inscriptions are hand-etched on both sides, except "MASTERED BY CAPITOL" text (stamped on side A only)

videos.title: Devo / New Traditionalists / Working In A Coalmine  (Audio)
videos.description:
#Devo  #BeautifulWorld  #NewTraditionalists

Devo is a 5 member new wave group that formed in Akron Ohio in 1973.
"New Traditionalists" was released on August 26, 1981 on Warner Brothers Records.
This is their 4th studio album and their follow-up to "Free

videos.title: DEVO - Boulder, CO PBS Special - 1981
videos.description: For the first time ever on YouTube, the complete broadcast of the Boulder, CO PBS DEVO New Traditionalists special.  The quality is what it is, but the video settings were increased to squeeze every bit of info from the VHS.  Audio levels also adjusted.

videos.title: DEVO- "Jerkin' Back 'N' Forth"/Interview 1982 [Reelin' In The Years Archives]
videos.description: Reelin’ In The Years Productions has available for licensing over 20,000 hours of music footage spanning 90 years. Additionally, we have more than 5,000 of hours of in-depth interviews with the 20th century’s icons of Film and Television, Politics, Comedy
